question.title: What is the primary purpose of radiography of the lumbar spine in infants and children suspected of having malformative scoliosis?

option_a.title: To confirm the diagnosis of scoliosis through clinical examination alone

option_b.title: To rule out other potential causes of curvature of the spine, such as rickets or cerebral palsy

option_c.title: To assess the degree of curvature and plan for surgical intervention if necessary

option_d.title: To provide a diagnostic imaging study for parents and guardians to review at home

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
